original_solution_mapping.L1: Stan needs to write 2,000 words because 5 x 400 = <<5*400=2000>>2,000
original_solution_mapping.L2: This will take him 40 minutes because 2,000 / 50 = <<2000/50=40>>40
original_solution_mapping.L3: He drinks 1/4 an ounce per minute because 15 / 60 = 1/4
original_solution_mapping.L4: He will drink 10 ounces of water while writing the paper because 40 x (1/4) = <<40*(1/4)=10>>10

original_function_code:
def solve():
    """Index: 2010.
    Returns: the total amount of water Stan needs to drink.
    """
    # L1
    num_pages = 5 # 5-page paper
    words_per_page = 400 # Each page will contain 400 words
    total_words_to_write = num_pages * words_per_page

    # L2
    typing_speed = 50 # 50 words per minute
    time_to_type_minutes = total_words_to_write / typing_speed

    # L3
    water_per_hour = 15 # drink 15 ounces of water
    minutes_per_hour = 60 # WK
    water_per_minute = water_per_hour / minutes_per_hour

    # L4
    total_water_needed = time_to_type_minutes * water_per_minute

    # FA
    answer = total_water_needed
    return answer

logical_steps.solution_line_template: Stan needs to write {total_words_to_write} words because {num_pages} x {words_per_page} = <<{num_pages}*{words_per_page}={total_words_to_write}>>{total_words_to_write}
This will take him {time_to_type_minutes} minutes because {total_words_to_write} / {typing_speed} = <<{total_words_to_write}/{typing_speed}={time_to_type_minutes}>>{time_to_type_minutes}
He drinks {water_per_minute} an ounce per minute because {water_per_hour} / {minutes_per_hour} = {water_per_minute}

He will drink {total_water_needed} ounces of water while writing the paper because {time_to_type_minutes} x ({water_per_minute}) = <<{time_to_type_minutes}*{water_per_minute}={total_water_needed}>>{total_water_needed}

flawed_nl_reconstruction.L1: Stan needs to write 2000 words because 5 x 400 = <<5*400=2000>>2000
flawed_nl_reconstruction.L2: This will take him 40 minutes because 2000 / 50 = <<2000/50=40>>40
flawed_nl_reconstruction.L3: He drinks 0.25 an ounce per minute because 15 / 60 = 0.25
flawed_nl_reconstruction.L4: He will drink 15 ounces of water while writing the paper because 60 x (0.25) = <<60*0.25=15>>15

explanation: Incorrect operand. The variable 'minutes_per_hour' (value: 60) was used instead of 'time_to_type_minutes' (value: 40.0).
